statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: There are two circles in the plane (shown in the below picture), there is a common area between the two circles. The problem is easy that you just tell me the common area.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are many cases. In each case, there are two lines. Each line has three numbers: the coordinates (X and Y) of the centre of a circle, and the radius of the circle.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, you just print the common area which is rounded to three digits after the decimal point. For more details, just look at the sample.

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2008 “Insigma International Cup” Zhejiang Collegiate Programming Contest - Warm Up（4）
